admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The Industrial Credit Project provides
            lending to help finance the foreign exchange cost of
            imported equipment for investments in medium- and
            small-scale industrial projects in the Republic of
            Macedonia, the autonomous Province of Kosovo,
            Bosnia-Herzegovina and Montenegvro during FYs 75 and 76.
